movies.title: The Tiger from Tjampa
movies.plot: Set in the 1930s, and narrated like a ballad from the past, The Tiger from Tjampa tells of how a young man, Lukman, seeks to avenge his father's murder by learning pencak silat, a traditional form of self defense, based on the movements of animals. The pencak silat seen in the film is regionally specific to West Sumatra. Silat in many other Indonesian films is often mixed with the kung fu of Hong Kong cinema.

biography.bio: Wahid Chan is an actor, known for The Tiger from Tjampa (1953), Krisis (1953) and Pembalasan (1951).
biography.name: Wahid Chan

biography.bio: Bambang Hermanto is an actor, known for La mal√©diction du kriss pusaka (1977), Pedjuang (1961) and Ponirah terpidana (1984).
biography.name: Bambang Hermanto

biography.bio: R.D. Ismail is an actor, known for Harta karun (1949), Lagi-lagi Krisis (1955) and Holiday in Bali (1962).
biography.name: R.D. Ismail

biography.bio: Malin Maradjo is an actor, known for The Tiger from Tjampa (1953).
biography.name: Malin Maradjo

biography.bio: Nurnaningsih is an actress, known for The Tiger from Tjampa (1953), Akhir sebuah impian (1973) and Krisis (1953).
biography.name: Nurnaningsih

biography.bio: Titi Savitri is an actress, known for The Tiger from Tjampa (1953), Dosa tak berampun (1951) and Terimaiah laguku (1952).
biography.name: Titi Savitri
